DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate safety tolerability single multiple intravenous ( IV ) infusion Aducanumab Japanese participant mild moderate Alzheimer 's Disease ( AD ) . The secondary objective study follow : To evaluate serum pharmacokinetics ( PK ) Aducanumab single multiple intravenous ( IV ) infusion Aducanumab ; To evaluate effect single multiple IV infusion Aducanumab immunogenicity .
DOC.brief_title: Single Multiple Ascending Dose Study Aducanumab ( BIIB037 ) Japanese Participants With Alzheimer 's Disease
DOC.criteria: Key Must ambulatory Must clinical diagnosis mild moderate AD Must good health determine Investigator , base medical history Screening assessment Must caregiver , understand study assent accompany subject study site visit , provide information Investigator/study site staff , specifically cognitive ability AEs/SAEs return perprotocol followup visit procedure Must consent blood sample collection deoxyribonucleic acid ( DNA ; genotyping ) ribonucleic acid ( RNA ; potential future analysis ) . Key Any medical neurological condition ( AD ) opinion Investigator could contribute cause subject 's dementia Transient ischemic attack stroke unexplained loss consciousness within 1 year prior Screening Poorly control diabetes mellitus , define dosage adjustment diabetic medication within 3 month prior Day 1 History unstable angina , myocardial infarction , chronic heart failure Chronic , uncontrolled hypertension History seizure within 3 year prior Screening History within past 6 month evidence clinically significant psychiatric illness History severe allergic anaphylactic reaction , history hypersensitivity inactive ingredient drug product NOTE : Other protocol define Inclusion/Exclusion criterion may apply
